review:
Do not recommend Girish SV to anyone. 

After booking an appointment, the doctor asked us to wait for few hours.
Then the doctor weighed the baby to check the weight ** ***** ** **** ** *** ***** ******** *** ******** ***** *** *** ********* ********. 

He asked us for a blood test and urine test for the baby. The nurse was very rude, poked the needle multiple times to the baby hand. ****** ****** *** *** ***** ******* *** ***** *** *** *******

Later when we found that the weighing scale was malfunctioned, he said see another doctor do not come here. **** ** *** ****************

Not recommended for any parents to consult this doctor or related nurse for . **** ***** **** **** ** *********** *** ******. Highly not satisfied.

review: Dr Girish sir is an amazing pediatrician and am very lucky to have consulted him since the birth of my child. He is a person with lot of patience and answers to all our queries in the language of our choice.
